To determine mixed hematopoietic chimerism safely establish use non-myeloablative conditioning regimen patient > 65 year age chronic myeloid leukemia ( CML ) chronic accelerate phase human leukocyte antigen ( HLA ) identical related donor . II . TRANSPLANTATION : Patients undergo allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation ( PBSCT ) day 0 . IMMUNOSUPPRESSION : Patients receive cyclosporine orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) IV BID thrice daily ( TID ) day -3 56 taper day 77 180 , mycophenolate mofetil PO IV BID day 0-27 .
